ItemTooltips.blink: Gives mobility and the ability to initiate, can disable 1-2 enemy heroes
ItemTooltips.ward_observer:
In Start: If we go hardlane block enemy pulls
Try to put on throughout the game
ItemTooltips.ward_sentry:
In Start: If we go easy lane unblock pulls|
if you see that the enemy has put wards try to deward
ItemTooltips.mekansm: Timely Heal can save your team at the appropriate time, if in addition you have a support your team warn that it will collect meka - two mekansm weast of money
ItemTooltips.cyclone: Saved from the enemy carry, neutralizes enemy initiator
ItemTooltips.force_staff: Saved from the enemy carry, also saving allies
ItemTooltips.necronomicon: If against you invis-hero grade to lvl 3
ItemTooltips.ultimate_scepter: Twice using ulti is awesome. Thx 6.81 update
ItemTooltips.diffusal_blade: Slowing enemies, lifting debuffs with allies
ItemTooltips.arcane_boots: Solves the problem with a lack of mana
ItemTooltips.veil_of_discord: In conjunction with the Soul catcher will great damage
ItemTooltips.rod_of_atos: Slowing enemies, a small increase to health

AbilityTooltips.shadow_demon_disruption: If properly used, can save himself and ally of unpleasant abilities, different disable and even Lina's Laguna Blade or Lion's Finger of Death
AbilityTooltips.shadow_demon_soul_catcher: With this ability, you can kill even the most thick tanks. The smaller the creeps will in applying the greater the chance that you will touch the hero
AbilityTooltips.shadow_demon_shadow_poison: Very strong nuke, the maximum number of stacks 19 and exactly 1320 damage
AbilityTooltips.shadow_demon_demonic_purge: Best Ulti for killing one target, knock all magic immunity and working on couriers because its fu**ing PURE MAGIC
